description.ko: 음파가 유동적이고 빛나는 기하학적 패턴으로 변환되어 ECHO-0의 핵심 의식을 표현하는 매혹적인 시각화입니다.
description.en: A mesmerizing display where auditory waves are translated into fluid, glowing geometric patterns, representing the core consciousness of ECHO-0.

prompt: A cinematic high-tech sound visualization, holographic glowing liquid waves, pulsating geometric patterns, deep blue and neon violet color palette, obsidian background, macro lens, 8k resolution, ethereal digital art style.
